attributes.action: Allow Parliament to debate the alternative withdrawal Paper by Leavers.
attributes.background: Debate needed to give a choice to MPs and help solve current deadlock.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we aren't sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

We aren't sure what proposal or document you would like Parliament to debate. 

You could start a new petition setting out clearly the proposal you would like to be debated.
